title: Luxury Lodge Stay with Kruger Safari Upgrade Available
description: Experience beautiful South Africa in five-star style with a stay at Blue Mountain Luxury Lodge, set in 200 hectares of indigenous bushland in picturesque Mpumalanga. Natural surrounds meet unparalleled luxury with daily champagne breakfast, nightly four-course fine-dining dinner with wine, daily afternoon tea and cocktails, and private return airport transfers included in this one-of-a-kind escape. Bucket-List Upgrade: Want to add more magic to the experience? Select an upgraded package, with an incredible Kruger Day Safari included.
offer_address: Blue Mountain Lodge P O Box 101 Kiepersol 1241 Mpumalanga, South Africa
